head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MELLONI, VINCENT ROCCO

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MELLONI, VINCENT ROCCO

block.p: MELLONI--Vincent Rocco, was born in the Bronx, NY; graduated from New York University and Brooklyn School of Law and practiced law for over 50 years with offices in the Bronx, NY. Visiting hours will be Thursday, January 25, 2007, 2-4 pm and 7-9 pm, Bennett Funeral Home, 824 Scarsdale Avenue, Scarsdale, NY. 914-725-1137. A Mass will be held for his memory at St. Pius X, Scarsdale, NY at 11 am on Friday, January 26th. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northern Westchester Hospital, Mt. Kisco, NY.
